title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jan 28 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jan 28 2022
description:
America mourns murdered police heroes, sea of blue outside NYPD funeral at St. Patrick's Cathedral. 2021 set a record for murdered police officers, but Clay barely ever saw a headline about it. Defund the police movement caused this. Buck noted: "This complete lie that there's a systemic murdering of unarmed black men by police officers that goes unpunished, it happens all the time, it's a national crisis. That's just not true." Heart wrenching eulogy by police widow, who said she hoped the huge crowd could be heard speaking through her. Dr. Marty Makary joins Clay and Buck to discuss his latest WSJ Op-Ed on natural immunity, and told them: "Natural immunity is now a hundred percent scientifically sound, durable, effective, and better than vaccines." Canadian PM Trudeau trashes Canadian trucker convoy against vax mandate. C&B take calls.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck
